insight 0.1.0.1

  • Changelog

Get the data from a model's random effects terms

random_data.Rd

Returns the data of all random effect terms.

random_data(x, ...)

Arguments

x

A fitted mixed model.
...

Currently not used.

Value

The data of all random effects terms, as data frame.

Examples

library(lme4)
data(sleepstudy)
# prepare some data...
sleepstudy$mygrp <- sample(1:5, size = 180, replace = TRUE)
sleepstudy$mysubgrp <- NA
for (i in 1:5) {
  filter_group <- sleepstudy$mygrp == i
  sleepstudy$mysubgrp[filter_group] <-
  sample(1:30, size = sum(filter_group), replace = TRUE)
}

m <- lmer(
  Reaction ~ Days + (1 | mygrp / mysubgrp) + (1 | Subject),
  data = sleepstudy
)
#> singular fit

random_data(m)
#>     mysubgrp mygrp Subject
#> 1          7     2     308
#> 2         21     2     308
#> 3         12     5     308
#> 4         29     1     308
#> 5         18     4     308
#> 6          6     2     308
